articles.title: Why does ++[[]][+[]]+[+[]] return the string "10"?
articles.description:
This is valid and returns the string "10" in JavaScript (more examples here):



console.log(++[[]][+[]]+[+[]])


Why? What is happening here?
articles.content:
If we split it up, the mess is equal to:
++[[]][+[]]
+
[+[]]
In JavaScript, it is true that +[] === 0. + converts something into a number, and in this case it will come down to +"" or 0 (see spec… [+3894 chars]
